header.heading: Reports
header.subhead: Independent research reports commissioned by GetUp

reports.heading: Insidious and Intentional: Political Interference and Harassment of the ABC
reports.description: A record of how the Coalition Government has systematically and relentlessly attacked the ABC, and the risks this creates for the ABC's independence and our communities

reports.heading: Democracy Dossier:  Secrecy and Power in Australia’s National Security State
reports.description: Report exposing Australia's growing culture of secrecy, and how creeping surveillance powers have been misappropriated to target journalists and whistleblowers.

reports.heading: Who controls our media
reports.description: Who controls our media details the far-reaching effects of media concentration on our democracy... and how to fight them.

reports.heading: Smokescreen: The rhetoric and reality of federal bushfire recovery modelling
reports.description: This report reviewed what was promised in the wake of the Black Summer fires with what was actually delivered on the ground.

reports.heading: Lies, debates, and silences: How News Corp produces climate scepticism in Australia
reports.description: This report proved not only that News Corp is negative towards climate action, but they're actively creating debate and confusion while they politicise the issue.

reports.heading: It's Our ABC
reports.description: This report, published with Per Capita, exposes the $783 million the Coalition has slashed from the ABC's budget since being elected in 2013.

reports.heading: Closing the Caribbean Connection
reports.description: Closing the Caribbean Connection modelled ways of closing corporate tax cheating loopholes – one of which was adopted by the Turnbull Government just months after its release!

reports.heading: Inside Job: Political Interference at the ABC
reports.description: This report exposed the intricate web of connections that was corroding our ABC's independence from the inside out. And make clear how we needed to stop it.

reports.heading: The Homegrown Power Plan
reports.description: The Homegrown Power Plan was a joint project between GetUp and Solar Citizens. The report maps out exactly how Australia can (and must) get to a 100% renewable future in less than a generation – and it's making political waves to this very day.

reports.heading: Dark Money: The hidden millions in Australia's political finance system
reports.description: This report exposed exactly how only 15% of financial contributions to the major political parties are transparent, and mapped out the path to a better way.

reports.heading: A History of Misconduct: The Case for a Federal Icac
reports.description: This report reveals a pattern of politicians acting with impunity, turning a blind eye to misconduct and sweeping scandals under the rug – all while making the powerful case for a Federal ICAC.
